name: Github Repo Statistics
description: Use this source to pull statistics from a Github repository like stars, views, etc. Provide the owner, repo name, and a personal access token.

groups.title: Repository Information
groups.description: Provide the repository name and owner. Please note that the repository must either be public or you must have access to it in order to pull all data.

groups.title: Advanced Parameters
groups.description: These parameters are used to keep track of paging from the Github API. They can be used to reset the data, but are best left alone.

parameters.name: token
parameters.label: Personal Access Token
parameters.description: Generate a Personal access token and enter it here.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.label: Owner
parameters.description: Enter the owner of the repository. Enter either a user or organizaation.

parameters.name: stargazerPage
parameters.label: Current Stars Page
parameters.description: The page of starred users that we've made it up to.

parameters.name: subscriberPage
parameters.label: Current Subscriber Page
parameters.description: The page of Subscribed users that we've made it up to.

nodes.name: Format

nodes.func:
msg.payload = 'Post is currently not supported. Use PUT to update.'
return msg;

msg.payload = 'Delete is currently not supported. Use PUT to update.'
return msg;

msg.payload = 'Patch is currently not supported. Use PUT to update.'
return msg;
